Package controller

Class MovieScreeningController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DatabaseController
      • controller.MovieScreeningController

  • public class MovieScreeningController
extends DatabaseController
    A controller to perform storing and retrieval of MovieScreening to/from database. Also validates changes before committing any changes to database.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Royston

    • Method Detail

      • getMovieScreenings

        public java.util.ArrayList<MovieScreening> getMovieScreenings​()
        Get list of the movie screenings.
        Returns:
        List of the movie screenings.

      • addMovieScreening

        public boolean addMovieScreening​(int movieScreeningID,
                                 int cinemaID,
                                 int movieID,
                                 java.util.Calendar startTime,
                                 MovieClassType movieType)
        Add a movie screening to a cinema. It will validates if the screening clashes with other screenings in the same cinema.
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - an absolute ID which identifies the unique movie screening.
        cinemaID - an absolute ID which identifies the unique cinema.
        movieID - an absolute ID which identifies the unique movie.
        startTime - the starting time of the movie.
        movieType - Movie type of screening (2D or 3D)
        Returns:
        true of the new movie screening is added successfully. false otherwise.

      • updateMovieScreening

        public boolean updateMovieScreening​(int movieScreeningID,
                                    int newCinemaID,
                                    int newMovieID,
                                    java.util.Calendar newStartTime,
                                    MovieClassType movieType)
        Update the movieScreening given the new CinemaID, movieID and new starting time and movieType. It will validate if the change is acceptable before committing the change (such as no time clash).
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - the unique movieScreeningID to be updated.
        newCinemaID - an absolute ID which identifies the unique cinema.
        newMovieID - an absolute ID which identifies the unique movie.
        newStartTime - the new starting time of the movie
        movieType - Movie type of screening (2D or 3D)
        Returns:
        true of the movie screening is updated successfully. false otherwise.

      • removeMovieScreening

        public MovieScreening removeMovieScreening​(int movieScreeningID)
        Removes the movieScreening based on its unique ID. It will validate it the movie object exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - the unique movieScreeningID to be removed.
        Returns:
        MovieScreening object of the movie screening if it is successfully removed. null object otherwise.

      • printMovieScreenings

        public void printMovieScreenings​()
        Print all the movie screenings info.

      • getMovieScreeningByScreeningID

        public MovieScreening getMovieScreeningByScreeningID​(int screeningID)
        Get the movie screening by its screening ID
        Parameters:
        screeningID - the unique screeningID of the movie screening.
        Returns:
        Movie screening object if it exists. null object if it cannot be found.

      • getMovieScreeningsByMovieID

        public java.util.ArrayList<MovieScreening> getMovieScreeningsByMovieID​(int movieID)
        Find all movie screenings of a movie.
        Parameters:
        movieID - the unique movieID of the movie.
        Returns:
        List of movie screenings of the movie.

      • setSeatSelected

        public boolean setSeatSelected​(int movieScreeningID,
                               int verticalIndex,
                               int horizontalIndex)
        Set a set for particular Moviescreening to booked. It will check if it is indeed bookable.
        Parameters:
        movieScreeningID - the unique movieScreeningID to be set the seat.
        verticalIndex - the index of the seat in Y-axis
        horizontalIndex - the index of the seat in X-axis
        Returns:
        true if it is set successfully to booked. false otherwise.

      • getInstance

        public static MovieScreeningController getInstance​()
        Gets the channel reference of the MovieScreeningController. Creates the channel reference if it do not exists.
        Returns:
        Instance of the MovieScreeningController.
